title: RtReleaseAssetITCase.executePatchRequest() unstable test
body:
see http://relics.rultor.com.s3.amazonaws.com/urn:facebook:1531296526/jcabi-github-on-commit/stdout/2014-05-02T18:50:00Z/log.txt

```
RtReleaseAssetITCase.executePatchRequest:81 HTTP response status is not equal to 200:
422 Unprocessable Entity [https://api.github.com/repos/jcabi-github-test/test/releases/300719]
Server: GitHub.com
Date: Fri, 02 May 2014 19:01:33 GMT
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4213

X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes:

X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
X-Frame-Options: deny
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'
Content-Length: 219
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Expose-Headers: ETag, Link, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval

{"message":"Validation Failed","documentation_url":"https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/releases/#edit-a-release","errors":[{"resource":"Release","code":"custom","message":"Published releases must have a valid tag"}]}
Expected: HTTP response with status 200
     but: was <422 Unprocessable Entity [https://api.github.com/repos/jcabi-github-test/test/releases/300719]

```

The test seems to be unstable. Let's fix.
